Wwise Unity Integration

Uninstalling the Wwise Integration Package

To uninstall the Wwise Integration Package:

  1. Go to the menu Assets > Wwise.
  2. Select Uninstall Wwise Integration.

This removes exclusively the Wwise-related files (the Assets folder) from your Unity project. It does not remove the Wwise components from your game objects, nor will it change any other settings.
